scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.build: rm -rf bundle && mkdir -p bundle && npm run build:lambda && npm run build:admin && cp -f global-bundle.pem bundle/global-bundle.pem || true
scripts.package-lambda: npm run build && cd bundle && zip -r ../hubspot-quickbooks-backend.zip . && cp ../hubspot-quickbooks-backend.zip ./hubspot-quickbooks-backend.zip && rm -f ../hubspot-quickbooks-backend.zip
scripts.update-lambda-code: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name HubspotQuickbookApiLambda --s3-bucket hubspot-quickbook-deployment --s3-key hubspot-quickbooks-backend.zip
scripts.deploy-lambda-code: npm run package-lambda && npm run upload-lambda-zip && npm run update-lambda-code
scripts.deploy-cloudformation: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name hubspot-quickbooks-backend --template-file cloudformation.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides LambdaS3Bucket=hubspot-quickbook-deployment LambdaS3Key=hubspot-quickbooks-backend.zip DocDBMasterUserPassword=N8f!Qw7z#Lp2Vx6T
